title: SysJoker backdoor - no OS is safe!
tags: Blog, News, KQL, Backdoor, Malware, Linux, Windows, MacOS
snippet: New SysJoker backdoor targets windows / MacOS and Linux…Recently researchers at Intezer discovered this new SysJoker backdoor malware after finding signs of it’s activity on a Linux Server back in December 2021. Upon further analysis and investigation they found that this malware had been created...

title: Microsoft Defender finally fixes scan exemption exploit
snippet: Microsoft finally makes bypassing defender scans harder…A little known exploit within Microsoft Defender that allowed anyone, regardless of permissions, to view the system scan exclusions has now finally been fixed.Any user could simply open an unelevated command prompt and run the following comm...
